channel.title: Adding models?
channel.description: Hi i have A model, when i add it to my Models folder nothing happens, Wat do i do and wat client base do i use???

item.title: Adding models?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

I learnt how to do, but I have a .dat File, Do i just Gzip it???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2008, 05:57:00 pm[/size][hr]ALSO what section is the right section???

Read full topic

item.title: Adding models?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“1 vitiello 1, post:3, topic:230102”]maybe i can help…more briefly explained.

Firstly you will need the model id and the ints, so what your gonna have to do is find the number of the gzipped model, for eg. model 12325.gz and you have to add it to the ints

Secondly, the ints must be placed in the class8.java file in your client

and 3rdly, you need to go in game and say add model ##### out loud

Compile your client and restart it.

Hope i helped.

[hr][ img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm92/ownage44/ipkiscapebanner-1-1.jpg[ /img]
^click it for a awesome server!^Ipkiscape, where your journey begins…

New client llllllllllllllllllllll 85% complete[/quote]
No advertising.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding models?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“1 vitiello 1, post:3, topic:230102”]maybe i can help…more briefly explained.

Firstly you will need the model id and the ints, so what your gonna have to do is find the number of the gzipped model, for eg. model 12325.gz and you have to add it to the ints

Secondly, the ints must be placed in the class8.java file in your client

and 3rdly, you need to go in game and say add model ##### out loud

Compile your client and restart it.

Hope i helped.

[hr]
^click it for a awesome server!^Ipkiscape, where your journey begins…
New source llllllllllllllllllllll 75% complete
New client llllllllllllllllllllll 85% complete[/quote]

Wrong order,

You will need the model id and the ints, so what your gonna have to do is find the number of the gzipped model, for eg. model 12325.gz and you have to add it to the ints

The ints must be placed in the class8.java file in your client

Compile your client and restart it.

You need to go in game and say add model ##### out loud

Restart your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding models?
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

you need to add the model in your model folder and log into your client and server and just typ add model (number of your model) and your model is added

Read full topic

item.title: Adding models?
item.dc:creator: @dds_tw1n dds tw1n
item.description:
@dds_tw1n wrote:

class8.anInt174 = MODELID;// Drop Model and Invo Model

Thats for drop and inventory, there is also male and female wearing.

Read full topic

and 3rdly, you need to go in game and say add model ##### out loud
